description: A district of ancient Athens located northwest of the Acropolis, the Kerameikos takes its name from the potters' workshops in the area; the portion of the district lying outside the Dipylon Gate served as a necropolis.

properties.description: Representative point location derived from analysis of Google Earth imagery.
properties.title: Imagery Location of Kerameikos
